document_data.name: Tempus's Tears
document_data.mainbody: '''Tempus's Tears''' was a village at the intersection of the [[Skuldask Road]] and [[Thundar's Ride]] at the heart of the [[Fields of the Dead]].
document_data.Locations:
There was a large standing stone set up at the intersection with an inscription: {{Quote|''Here was peace this day made.
Let [[Tempus]] cry bitter tears.
No more our dead we'll parade
And live cloaked in waiting fear.''}} Tempus's Tears was among the gnome settlements linked through the [[magic]]al transportation network known as the [[Trail of Mists]].{{Cite web/Mintiper's Chapbook/Part 6}}
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[dwarf]] and [[gnome]] villagers lived in burrow homes as the area of the village was covered in stone ruins.
document_data.Legends:
The villagers said the stones were under the protection of [[Amaeraszantha]], an [[amethyst dragon]].

Located in the ruins was the [[Stone that Speaks]]. Scholars of [[Candlekeep]] had long sought that relic.<ref>
